fields.name: enabledFeatures
fields.description: The field for the enabledFeatures record component.

fields.name: hasPermissions
fields.description: The field for the hasPermissions record component.

fields.name: holders
fields.description: The field for the holders record component.

constructors.name: ItemDisplayParameters
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a ItemDisplayParameters record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: enabledFeatures
methods.description: Returns the value of the enabledFeatures record component.

methods.name: hasPermissions
methods.description: Returns the value of the hasPermissions record component.

methods.name: holders
methods.description: Returns the value of the holders record component.
